system.description:
Your ability to prepare for the worst increases. You gain a free frugal, grade 1 Safe House stronghold in any city you visit. This safe house always counts as a haven, but it is temporary. If you visit a new city, you lose the previous safe house and acquire a new one.

If you wish, you may pay to make a stronghold acquired this way permanent. It has the normal cost for a stronghold of its size and type. If you do, it is not lost when you relocate to a different city.
